### Deploy Nightscout

You can use several methods to deploy your Nightscout site:

[Manually](../../../nightscout/ubuntu), command by command.

Using a [deployment script](../../../nightscout/xdripteam).

Using a [Docker](../../../nightscout/docker) container.

</br>
